cause.description:
Fairfax County Chairman Gerry Connolly is working with the Sierra Club to develop the "Cool Counties" program. Cool Counties is designed to encourage counties across the nation to take concrete, measurable steps to reduce carbon emissions and curb global warming.
Join this cause to show your support for Cool Counties and to encourage other counties across the nation to participate in the program.
Do a home energy audit: http://www.eere.energy.gov/consumer/your_home/
Take the CFL pledge: http://energystar.gov/index.cfm?fuseaction=cal....
1. Global warming is a real threat to society.
2. We need a systematic, national approach to address the problem of global warming.
3. Local governments should demonstrate a real committment to reducing carbon emissions.
cause.mission: Fight global warming one county at a time, starting in Fairfax.
cause.name: CoolFairfax
